translation.welcomeNoLeadCollection:
ğŸ‘‹ Welcome to the Wheel Of Twilio! We're excited to have you join us.

By placing a bet, you agree that we can contact you for this game. All data will be deleted after the event.
translation.invalidEmail:

Example: yourname@company.com

translation.winnerCallSmallPrize: <Response><Say>Congratulations! You bet on the right field and won. Stop by the Twilio booth to claim your prize!</Say></Response>
translation.winnerCallRafflePrize: <Response><Say>Congratulations! You won the grand prize and can claim your prize at the Twilio booth!</Say></Response>
translation.winnerMessageRafflePrize: Congratulations! You won the grand prize and can claim your prize at the Twilio booth!
translation.winnerMessageRaffleQualification:
Congratulations! You are now qualified for the prize!
